text:
Priyanka gets a social media boost

Actor Priyanka Chopra’s international popularity courtesy American TV series Quantico has helped her garner six million followers on Instagram. She is “overwhelmed” and has thanked everyone for the love.

The 33-year-old, who has delivered hits like Bajirao Mastani , Aitraaz and Gunday is ahead of actors Shah Rukh Khan’s 1.2 million followers, Salman Khan’s 3.5 million Instagram family and megastar Amitabh Bachchan, who has 1.3 million followers on the photo-sharing website.

“Whaaaa? 6 million already! So overwhelmed... Our family has grown so fast!” Priyanka tweeted. — IANS
title: Priyanka Chopra has 6 million followers on Instagram
